ygData.subject: new chardok weap
ygData.msgSnippet: hi all, i am sure you noticed the new changes to chardok. yesterday evening i was there with a guild group and it was a blast. we camped the exit corridor and
ygData.messageBody:
hi all,
i am sure you noticed the new changes to chardok. yesterday evening i was
there with a guild group and it was a blast. we camped the exit corridor and
cleared the whole gate. the seargent spawed frequently and dropped various
very good items, also a bard-only blunt weapon Di┬┤Zok Wristsnapper 10/18 Ac5
cha/int/agi 7 wt1.5. very nice! also got 4 blues in 3,5 hours hunting there
level 52. i was cc and had no big problems even with 3 pulls, mezzing and
charming.
so now i am planning to go there more often. its much more fun than vl and
great loot also.
if you have any more information on the new chardok plz mail.

cheer
tobi
